title: Audit Construction Project Change Orders
description: An auditor reviews the change order process for a major construction project to ensure changes are valid and properly approved.

tasks.description: Obtain the log of all change orders submitted for the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor has a complete list of project change orders.

tasks.description: Select a sample of 10 high-value change orders for review.
For each sampled change order, verify that it was reviewed and approved by the project manager and a company executive, as required by the project governance policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms all sampled change orders had the required levels of approval.
